content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

of using the function in your README.
```julia
function wrap_string(s::AbstractString; text_width = 10)
    lines = String[]
    line = ""
    for word in split(s, " ")
        if length(line * " " * word) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    push!(lines, line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

```julia-repl
julia> wrap_string("I am a very long line of text! This is another line.", text_width = 25)
"I am a very long line\nof text!\nThis is another line."
```
